artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Iseya Kanekichi; Carver: Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: portrait of a man wearing a white headscarf with splatters on top and a kimono with grey, blue and purple stripes and light blue arcing patterns, with his arms crossed; building behind man
inscription: 岩はしの　夜の契も　たへぬへし　あくる侘しき　かつらきの神
markings: censor seals: {Hama} | {Magome} | (Rat 9) | publisher\'s seal: {Isekane} | carver\'s seal: 彫竹 {hori Take}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The Visual Parody of the Thirty-Six Selected Poets (Mitate sanjūrokkasen no uchi 見立三十六歌撰之内)
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
title: Poem by Sanjōin Onna Kurōdo Sakon: (Actor Ichikawa Danjūrō VIII as) Tokijirō
